code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{deleteTransaction}from'../../features/transactions/TransactionsSlice';import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TransactionList=()=>{const transactions=useSelector(state=>state.transactions.transactions);const dispatch=useDispatch();const[visibleCount,setVisibleCount]=useState(5);if(transactions.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Brak transakcji"});}const sorted=[...transactions].sort((a,b)=>new Date(b.date)-new Date(a.date));const visible=sorted.slice(0,visibleCount);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transaction-scroll-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Lista transakcji"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"transaction-scroll",children:visible.map(_ref=>{let{id,amount,type,category,note,date}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:type==='income'||type==='collected'||type==='sold'?'income':'expense',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transaction-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:category})," \u2014 ",amount.toFixed(2)," ",type==='collected'||type==='sold'?'szt.':'zł.'," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:date}),note&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("em",{children:["Notatka: ",note]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(deleteTransaction(id)),children:"Usu\u0144"})]},id);})}),visibleCount<sorted.length&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"show-more-btn",onClick:()=>setVisibleCount(visibleCount+5),children:"Poka\u017C wi\u0119cej"})]});};export default TransactionList;
